text: Jay Montgomery Garner (born April 15, 1938) is a retired United States Army lieutenant general. He was appointed in 2003 as Director of the Office for Reconstruction and Humanitarian Assistance for Iraq following the 2003 invasion of Iraq. He was replaced by Paul Bremer.US arms trader to run Iraq The Observer, March 30, 2003. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Military people from Florida Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jay Garner
